channel.title: Crypto-Forecast on Archive 03
channel.description: Recent content in Crypto-Forecast on Archive 03

item.title: Is It Time to Invest in Solana ($SOL)? A Look at 2026 Price Predictions
item.description: As of November 2025, Solana (SOL) is struggling around the $125 mark. While the launch of the Bitwise ETF is bringing in institutional funds, network stability and token unlock issues are holding it back. What scenarios might unfold in 2026? Three investment assistants engage in a heated debate based on the data.
